Text: Me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa, ame̩ abo Israe̩l;
e̩wñ du de̩ n, chai e̩bo̩ ego̩ kpʼe̩bo̩ ebie̩ kpʼone̩ ekpa, kpʼoji eji kpʼe̩ño̩ya eche kpʼo̩ko̩ eje̩;
E̩ne̩ du ki muda juja n,
Abo-mi mukpabie̩ tod e̩wñ ema ku ma ma ne̩ n;
Abe̩le̩ i la ade̩, alu kʼamone̩ de̩ abe̩le̩ atama ade̩;
Ma la aje̩ e̩wñ, i abʼuma jo̩ n;
Ma kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ oj uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba,
Omi abʼudu ñw amo̩ma-me̩ onobule̩ e̩gba ku ma chʼabutabu n,
Dagba kʼuwe̩, O Israe̩l, chaka tʼajo̩ko̩,
Ifraim kwomanyʼode ode me̩, tʼo̩ no̩.
Afu ki aju mʼika-wñ ko wenyʼu,
